discover.instruction: Read the academic text. Notice how verbs become nouns.
discover.instruction_ru: Прочитай академический текст. Обрати внимание, как глаголы становятся существительными.

content.text: <highlight>The implementation</highlight> of new policies requires careful planning. <highlight>The acquisition</highlight> of language skills is a gradual process. <highlight>The failure</highlight> to address climate change will have serious consequences. <highlight>The reduction</highlight> of emissions is a global priority. <highlight>The establishment</highlight> of democratic institutions took decades. <highlight>The assumption</highlight> that progress is inevitable may be flawed. <highlight>The emergence</highlight> of new technologies has transformed society. <highlight>The recognition</highlight> of human rights remains incomplete. <highlight>The investigation</highlight> into the incident is ongoing. <highlight>The transformation</highlight> of the economy was remarkable.
content.question: How does using nouns instead of verbs change the text's style?
content.question_ru: Как использование существительных вместо глаголов меняет стиль текста?

points.rule: Verb → Noun: implement → implementation, develop → development
points.rule_ru: Глагол → Существительное: implement → implementation, develop → development
points.example: We implemented the plan → The implementation of the plan...

points.rule: Adjective → Noun: possible → possibility, important → importance
points.rule_ru: Прилагательное → Существительное: possible → possibility, important → importance
points.example: It is important → The importance of this...

points.rule: The + noun + of: The development of technology = Technology developed
points.rule_ru: The + существительное + of: The development of technology = Technology developed
points.example: The discovery of penicillin changed medicine.

points.rule: Noun + preposition patterns: in response to, as a result of, for the purpose of
points.rule_ru: Существительное + предлог паттерны: in response to, as a result of, for the purpose of
points.example: In response to criticism, changes were made.

points.rule: Purpose: creates objectivity, formality, information density
points.rule_ru: Цель: создаёт объективность, формальность, плотность информации
points.example: Informal: They failed because they didn't plan. Formal: Their failure resulted from a lack of planning.

notice.instruction: Identify nominalizations and their original verb/adjective forms.
notice.instruction_ru: Определи номинализации и их исходные глагольные/прилагательные формы.

tasks.text:
Academic sentences:

1. The establishment of the United Nations marked a new era.
2. The impossibility of complete objectivity is widely accepted.
3. The reduction of poverty requires global cooperation.
4. The assumption that markets are efficient has been challenged.
5. The transformation of rural areas is accelerating.
6. The recognition of indigenous rights was long overdue.
7. There is a growing awareness of environmental issues.
8. The emergence of artificial intelligence raises ethical questions.
9. The failure to act on climate change will have consequences.
10. The development of vaccines was remarkably rapid.

produce.instruction: Rewrite an informal text using nominalizations for academic style.
produce.instruction_ru: Перепиши неформальный текст, используя номинализации для академического стиля.
prompts: Transform informal explanations into academic prose
Write an introduction to a research paper
produce.example:
Informal: Scientists discovered that the virus mutates quickly. They analyzed data from many countries. It was hard to develop a vaccine because the virus changed so fast. Governments responded by implementing strict measures.

Formal: The discovery that the virus undergoes rapid mutation presented significant challenges. The analysis of data from multiple countries revealed the extent of variation. The development of an effective vaccine was complicated by the rapidity of viral changes. The governmental response involved the implementation of strict preventive measures.

input_flood.description: Read 5 academic texts with heavy nominalization.

texts.title: Climate Research
texts.content: The acceleration of global warming has led to increased awareness of environmental issues. The reduction of carbon emissions remains a priority for policymakers. The implementation of the Paris Agreement faces significant challenges. The failure to achieve targets would have catastrophic consequences. The transformation of energy systems is essential. The development of renewable technologies offers hope. The recognition of the urgency is growing. The assumption that gradual change is sufficient may prove incorrect.

texts.title: Economic Analysis
texts.content: The emergence of the digital economy has led to a fundamental transformation of business practices. The acquisition of technical skills is now essential for employment. The importance of innovation cannot be overstated. The assumption that traditional models remain valid has been challenged. The failure of many companies to adapt resulted in their decline. The development of new strategies is crucial. The recognition of market changes often comes too late. The implementation of reforms requires careful planning.

texts.title: Medical Research
texts.content: The discovery of antibiotics represented a major advancement in medicine. The development of resistance, however, poses new challenges. The failure to complete courses of treatment contributes to this problem. The implementation of strict protocols is essential. The reduction of unnecessary prescriptions is a priority. The awareness of proper usage must be increased. The possibility of untreatable infections is deeply concerning. The establishment of global monitoring systems is underway.

texts.title: Educational Theory
texts.content: The acquisition of language skills involves complex cognitive processes. The recognition of individual differences is fundamental to effective teaching. The importance of meaningful input has been well established. The assumption that learning is linear has been challenged. The emergence of communicative approaches transformed pedagogy. The implementation of these methods requires appropriate training. The development of fluency takes time and practice. The failure to provide authentic materials limits progress.

texts.title: Political Science
texts.content: The establishment of democratic institutions requires more than elections. The development of civil society is equally important. The recognition of human rights forms the foundation of just governance. The implementation of reforms often meets resistance. The transformation of authoritarian systems is gradual. The failure to address inequality can undermine stability. The assumption that democracy is inevitable has proven naive. The emergence of populist movements presents new challenges.
